title: Decision Making

questions.text: When making important decisions, I rely most on...
When plans change unexpectedly, I typically...
choices: Prefer to stick to the original plan
Need time to process the change

questions.text: My approach to planning a date night is...
choices: Completely spontaneous - see where the night takes us
A rough idea with room for flexibility

questions.text: When shopping for something important, I...
choices: Buy what feels right in the moment
Research extensively for the best choice

questions.text: If I'm unsure about a choice, I'm most likely to...
choices: Make a decision and adjust as needed
Sleep on it and decide tomorrow

description: Learn how you both tackle choices big and small.
